page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT IN BALQUHIDDER
page.content: In Balquhidder the adults have quite a few different kinds of entertainment. At varying times of the year there are dances and ceilidhs in the village hall. In the winter, bowls are started and quite a few people in the glen go to that. Sometimes there is a village Fete and there is always a good turnout. Another very popular winter pastime is whist and both children and adults enjoy that. Quite a few families in the glen are curlers and some of them are skips and coaches. This is a very good area for hill walking and men and women both do a lot of climbing. Some are members of the mountain rescue team. After a hard day of work the men like to go to the local hotel. There is also a well attended Country Dancing class.
